articles.title: Much ado about Nothing: British firm's new phone is a mid-range marvel
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Nothing's Phone 3a is a new smartphone from a London-based company headed by OnePlus co-founder Carl Pei. It costs $600. It has a great look, an impressive screen and a triple camera system (including a 2x zoom), but it also offers a distinct software experience that's both productivity-minded and fun.

articles.title: Much ado about Nothing: British firm's new phone is a mid-range marvel

It has a great look, an impressive screen and a triple camera system (including a 2x zoom), but it also offers a distinct software experience that's both productivity-minded and fun.

articles.title: 34 Ridiculously Clever Kitchen Products From Small Businesses On Amazon
articles.author: Iman Sakrani
articles.summary: In this economy, we need freshness saver balls. Buddeez is a family-owned, Missouri-based small business. Quick & Clean is a small business that specializes in coffee machine cleaning products. GripStic bag sealers keep Trader Joe's chips fresh after a week. Bottle Bright tablets make cleaning a water bottle easy.

articles.title: Linux power users: Here's a distro with a refreshing approach to OS design
articles.author: Jack Wallen
articles.summary: NixOS is an open-source operating system that is available to install and use for free. It offers several desktop environments to choose from and is as rock-solid as any OS on the market. However, there's a steep learning curve for installing non-free software. NixOS isn't as difficult as Gentoo but it's not as user-friendly as Ubuntu.

articles.title: "Nobody was perfect when they started": Sonu Sood asks people to be kind to debutants as Ibrahim-Khushi get trolled for 'Nadaaniyan'
articles.summary: Sonu Sood urges people to be kind to debutants in the film industry. Ibrahim Ali Khan and Khushi Kapoor were recently seen in the Netflix film Nadaaniyan. The film premiered on Netflix on March 7. It is directed by Shauna Gautam and produced by Karan Johar and Apoorva Mehta.

articles.title: Poppi Unveils New Innovations On The Heels Of A Milestone Year
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Poppi is unveiling new innovations and flavors after hitting a $500+ million year in 2024, and it will be worth $500 million a year in 2025.  iReport.com will let you know when Poppi unveils its new products.

articles.title: Briefs: Man, son feared drowned in canal
articles.summary: According to CNN.com, the number of women in the U.S. is at an all-time high. It is estimated at more than half a billion people. The number is estimated to be approaching 60 million people. It's estimated to reach 70 million by the year's end.

articles.title: Explore Chatbot Gemini 2.0: Paint, Retouch, and More in Google AI Studio
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Gemini 2.0 Flash is a new AI that understands text and analyzes images and can create them. It is available for free via Google AI Studio and requires only a Google account for access. It's a step forward in AI technology and offers creative possibilities for both personal and professional use.

articles.title: AirPods are finally stealing one of Google and Samsung's best features
articles.author: Oscar Gonzalez
articles.summary: Apple is rumoured to be working on a new Live Translation feature for its AirPods earbuds. It might be shown off in June at Apple's developer conference. It's unclear if the feature will be available only on the larger AirPuds Max or if it will be integrated into the earbud.

articles.title: Airtel Africa Unveils AI-Powered Spam Alert Service to Combat SMS Fraud
articles.author: Innovation Village
articles.summary: Airtel Nigeria has launched an AI-powered Spam Alert Service to combat SMS fraud. It is the first of its kind in Africa. The service is rolled out in Lagos, Nigeria and will revolutionize the way mobile users tackle fraudulent SMS schemes.

articles.title: Rise of the AI apps AI应用的崛起
articles.author: 理查德•沃特斯
articles.summary: The client-server era that took off in the 1990s brought Oracle and SAP, while cloud computing gave birth to Salesforce and a host of'software as a service' companies. One challenge is to turn an AI-powered tool designed for one task into a core part of a customers' software.

articles.title: Rise of the AI apps
articles.author: Richard Waters
articles.summary: Every new computing platform opens the door to a new generation of software companies. Large language models are shaping up to be the next platform to launch a thousand entrepreneurial dreams. With generative AI available on tap from companies such as OpenAI and Anthropic, there has been a blizzard of'smart apps' designed to make work easier.

articles.title: How AI is changing Print-on-Demand
articles.author: Janette Toral
articles.summary: Napoleon Beltran explains how to earn $1,000 per month with Print-on-Demand (POD). POD allows anyone to launch a brand and generate income by selling custom-designed products. Success in POD is about understanding customer demand, optimizing product listings, and leveraging AI to maximize efficiency.

articles.title: Sulwhasoo Gave Its Most Iconic K-beauty Skin Care Line a Major Upgrade — And My Complexion Got a Glow Up.
articles.author: Claire Sullivan
articles.summary: Korean skin care brand Sulwhasoo recently refreshed its Concentrated Ginseng Rejuvenating Collection of face serums and moisturizers. The new collection is a seven-piece skin care collection that feels like a bespoke Korean facial when you use it and makes your skin radiate to boot.

articles.title: How long can you really leave laundry sitting in the washing machine – and the mould danger zone to avoid, warns expert
articles.author: Claudia Jackson
articles.summary: How long is too long to leave wet clothes in the washing machine before you need to wash them again? Hygiene and cleaning pro, Mary Futher, who goes by Madame Sweat on social media, explains this to her Instagram followers. Other cleaning fans share their tips on how to beat damp smells.

articles.title: How long can you really leave laundry sitting in the washing machine – and the mould danger zone to avoid, warns expert
articles.author: Claudia Jackson
articles.summary: Mary Futher, a cleaning pro, shares her tips on how to get rid of the damp clothes smell in the washing machine. Other cleaning fans share their tips too. Low temperature cycles and dirty door seals can cause unpleasant odours in washing machines, but they can be fixed with a service wash.

The update is already rolling out worldwide and includes a refreshed design, enhanced performance, and advanced artificial intelligence features. Samsung's strategy is to unify its ecosystem under a cohesive experience.

articles.title: How often you should be cleaning your washing machine to remove 'odour-smell'
articles.author: Courtney Eales
articles.summary: Washing machines keep our clothes clean and make them smell nice. According to Good Housekeeping, washing machines should be cleaned every 3-6 months. Hotpoint recommend using a descaler to prevent limescale build-up in washing machines. @christyytiktok shared a trick for deep cleaning washing machines without resorting to harsh chemicals.

articles.author:
Steve Craddock
        
Court
articles.summary: Flintshire Council has given the go-ahead for the development of a launderette in Chester Road East, Shotton. The application was submitted by A&S Newton Cleaning Services in January. Previous usage of the property was an office based accountancy practice. Ward councillor for Shotton West supports the application.

articles.title: What Helpful Ingredient Swap Or Substitution Do You Absolutely Swear By?
articles.author: Jen Shiori Adams
articles.summary: The other day, when she was making stir fry for dinner, she realized she was missing one of the main ingredients to make the sauce: cornstarch. She found some flour in her pantry and it got the job done. Honey and maple syrup can be used as sugar substitutes in sauces, dressings and curries.

articles.title: Panasonic Lumix ZS99 Review: Pocketable Point-and-Shoot With a Long Zoom
articles.author: Geoffrey Morrison
articles.summary: Panasonic Lumix ZS99 is a compact, 20.3-megapixel camera with an impressive 30x optical zoom. It's marketed as a "travel zoom" and features a variety of automatic modes as well as some more advanced manual features. Its zoom goes from a wide 24mm to an extreme telephoto of 720mm (both 35mm equivalent numbers). It's roughly 60% of the length of my Pixel 9 Pro. It works decently enough, given the camera's price.

articles.title: How Does ChatGPT Work? OpenAI's Groundbreaking Chatbot, Explained
articles.summary: ChatGPT is an artificial intelligence chatbot based on OpenAI's GPT-4 large language model. It parses the user's natural-language prompts or multimedia input and generates a relevant response informed by the data used to train the AI. PCMag rated ChatGPT's language translation capabilities highly compared with Google Translate. It's an excellent copyeditor for any text you may wish it to proofread. Mobile users can take advantage of the microphone in their phone or tablet. ChatGpt Plus subscribers can upload images to the service to inform its process and output. Unlimited access to DALL-E is included in the paid service tiers.

articles.title: It always turns into a grift with these people
articles.author: PZ Myers
articles.summary: Bryan Johnson wants to turn his lifestyle and his weird recipes into commodities that he can sell to gullible people. He set up a conference that you can attend for the low, low price of $249 ($1799 for the premium package) and he and his associates will lecture you on how to live longer. Johnson is taking his medicine show on the road, and is going to be bringing it to Los Angeles, New York, and Miami.

articles.title: CJ Raut inaugurates Consumer Court
articles.summary: Chief Justice Prakash Man Singh Raut inaugurated Nepal's first Consumer Court today. The court aims to provide judicial redress for consumers and address disputes related to quality goods and services. The Consumer Court has jurisdiction over Kathmandu, Lalitpur, and Bhaktapur districts.

articles.title: These '90s Logos Used To Be UBER Iconic Back In The Day — Can You Name Them Today?
articles.author: Sara Thompson
articles.summary: The '90s started over 35 years ago, but in my mind Taco Bell and Sprite are still recognisable. Has too much time passed for you to recognize those logos? This quiz has been enhanced using AI-powered creativity tools.   It's a quiz party at BuzzFeed.

articles.title: Mini Convertible launched in Singapore, Lifestyle News
articles.summary: Mini has launched the new Mini Convertible here in Singapore. The car has a folding roof that can be opened like a sunroof or fully retracted. It has a 2.0-litre engine with 201bhp and a peak torque of 300Nm. It can reach 100 km/h from a standstill in 6.9 seconds. The John Cooper Works Convertible has a 228bhp 2.5 litre engine and can complete the century sprint in 6:4 seconds. It comes with JCW sport seats with perforated synthetic leather.

It has a 6.67-inch AMOLED display with Full HD+ resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate. The 200MP main rear camera makes a return, offering high-resolution shots. The phone is available in three color options: Blue, Purple and Black. It is powered by a 5,000 mAh battery with support for 33W fast charging and costs $260.

articles.summary: Steel Seed will launch on April 10th. In the game you play Zoe, a nimble and upgradeable robot, and her flying drone acquaintance Koby. The overarching story is about "exploring the fine line between human and machine, trust and control, resilience and despair".

articles.title: This Cordless Vacuum Leaves Every Surface of My Home Ultra-Clean, and It's on Sale at Amazon
articles.author: Toni Sutton
articles.summary: The P13 Pro Cordless Vacuum has 45,000 pascals of suction power. The motorized brush head swivels up to 180 degrees horizontally and 90 degrees vertically. The battery life lasts long enough to clean the entire apartment in one charge. The vacuum converts into a handheld device and includes a crevice tool and dust brush.

articles.summary: Jo Malone, Tom Ford and Phlur are launching mist versions of their best-selling scents. A body mist is a lighter, fresher take on a traditional perfume. Kylie Cosmetics Cosmic Hair and Body Mist is £28 for a 100ml bottle on Selfridges.

articles.title: China's Baidu releases new, free AI model to compete with DeepSeek
articles.author: ADEK BERRY
articles.summary: Chinese internet search giant Baidu released a new artificial intelligence reasoning model Sunday and made its AI chatbot services free. Technology companies in China have been scrambling to release improved AI platforms since start-up DeepSeek shocked its rivals with its open source and highly cost-efficient model in January.
